solution_line_template: The {num_eight_inch_subs} {length_eight_inch_sub} inch subs total {total_length_eight_inch_subs} inches because {num_eight_inch_subs} x {length_eight_inch_sub} = <<{num_eight_inch_subs}*{length_eight_inch_sub}={total_length_eight_inch_subs}>>{total_length_eight_inch_subs}

She still needs {remaining_sub_needed} inches of sub because {total_sub_needed}-{total_length_eight_inch_subs} = <<{total_sub_needed}-{total_length_eight_inch_subs}={remaining_sub_needed}>>{remaining_sub_needed}

She needs to buy {num_five_inch_subs} five inch subs because {remaining_sub_needed} / {length_five_inch_sub} = <<{remaining_sub_needed}/{length_five_inch_sub}={num_five_inch_subs}>>{num_five_inch_subs}
